pr_title: BAPL-1547 :Improvement the REST API in Business-Central adding the groups/roles operations available in the UI

timeline.message: BAPL-1547 :Improvement the REST API in Business-Central adding the groups/roles operations available in the UI
BAPL-1547 :Improvement the REST API in Business-Central adding the groups/roles operations available in the UI

timeline.bodyText: The "resource types" expression is used for another concept in the workbench. I think a better name here would be DefaultAppFormerActivities. Same goes for other classes and variables related to this one.
timeline.author: paulovmr
